entry.title: First item
entry.content:
Each Atom entry will have title |nodename|.

pubDate of each record is parsed from first link found in node. It has to be in RFC3339 format (i know, this isn't easy to write, but I have to get this information from somewhere)! Format is very simple: YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS+timezone.

URL of first link (date, remember?) is taken as entry url, everything else is considered as content of Atom's entry.

Well, that's all. Simple, isn't it?

entry.title: Added support for templates!
entry.content: Added support for own templates, see __CSS and __TEMPLATE node.
